CANNED FRUITS WILL BE CHILLED TWO HOURS PRIOR TO SERVING. THIRTY (30) MINUTES PRIOR TO SERVING OF FRUITS INTO A SERVING CONTAINER SELF SERVICE BY DINERS. WHEN REPLENISHING THE LINE ONE CAN WILL BE USED. FOOD SERVICE PERSONNEL SHOULD TAKE INTO CONSIDERATION THE AMOUNT OF TIME REMAINING TO SERVE WHEN REPLENISHING THE LINE. CANNED FRUITS WILL BE MADE AVAILABLE THROUGHOUT THE SERVING PERIOD. AFTER SERVING. THE AMOUNT USED WILL BE ENTERED ON THE KITCHEN REQUISITION AND RETURN WORKSHEET. NOTE: NUMBER OF CANS NEEDED PER 100 PORTIONS AND SERVING SIZE; ITEM CNS SERVING SIZE PINEAPPLE CHUNKS #10 1/2 1/2 CUP APRICOTS #10 1/2 3 - 5 HALVES FRUIT COCKTAIL #10 1 1/2 CUP PEACHES SLICED #10 1 1/2 CUP PEARS #10 1 1/2 CUP
